short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BMW Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD BMW background. BMW wallpaper theme for cars fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle BMW wallpapers each time a new tab opens.
2. Choose a random BMW background or mark favorites from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Display of current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Easy access to your frequently visited sites.
8. Quick access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to a shortcut panel for instant access.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Explore additional themes quickly.
12. Easy social media sharing options.
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.
14. Instant access to play games.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your BMW new tab.
